text: Liam Finn is a rock singer who was born in Australia, grew up in New Zealand but now lives in London in England. Liam is the son of Neil Finn, the singer of the famous group Crowded House. He is currently a member of Crowded House, as guitarist and vocalist, along with his brother Elroy on drums. Liam was lead singer of the band Betchadupa in New Zealand. Liam continues to have a solo career, playing shows in Ireland and the UK in June and July 2024 while on tour with Crowded House. His solo work is marked by his ability as a multi- instrumentalist, he records multiple guitar riffs and drum beats using foot pedals and loops them while playing and singing over the top. Liam Finn played a song in the television show of David Letterman in 2008. ==Discography == ===Studio albums=== * I'll Be Lightning (2007) * Champagne In Seashells EP (2009) * FOMO (2011) === Live albums === * Live (in Spaceland) – 22 February 2008, Spaceland Recordings * Live From The Wiltern – (2008) Yep Roc Records Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Rock musicians Category:New Zealand singers
title: Liam Finn
